description: A collection of circles in a teardrop-shaped formation with the point in the top right corner of the picture; there is also a rhombus-shaped formation above the teardrop-shaped formation and two smaller rhombus-shaped formations below it. Each circle has a different number in the center denoting how many lines stem from that point. There is a red triangle toward the left side of the teardrop-shaped formation and a very thin orange triangle at the point of the teardrop-shaped formation.

author.name: VertexArchive
author.description: An UNOFFICIAL archive of the New York Times' Vertex puzzle. This account is not affiliated with the NY Times. I just like the triangles.
